location: Songjiang Road Lane 252, near Xingtian Temple, Zhongshan District. 502m from Songjiang Nanjing MRT, 578m from Zhongxiao Xinsheng MRT.
notes: Brand new first-hand renovation (全新第一手裝潢), fully furnished move-in ready studio with elevator. Cooking is permitted with natural gas, and there is a balcony, washing machine, fridge, AC, and sofa — all practical for a couple with a baby. At 11.73 ping it is a studio (套房) which may feel tight for a growing family; confirm balcony railing height and window safety locks for baby-proofing. No pets allowed; parking available at extra cost. Excellent MRT access with two stations nearby.
